title: Virtual Assistant (Notion Specialist) – Organised, Proactive, and Great with Systems
salary: $2.00–$4.00/hour depending on experience and Notion fluency
job_overview:
???? Job Description:

I’m looking for a reliable virtual assistant who’s confident using Notion to help organise my projects, build clean dashboards, document SOPs, and keep operations on track.

This is a part-time role (5–10 hours per week to start), with the potential to grow over time.

?

???? Tasks Include:
 • Creating/updating Notion dashboards, databases, SOPs, and templates
 • Turning voice notes or messy docs into clear, structured pages
 • Maintaining project timelines, recurring checklists, and trackers
 • Documenting workflows and updating internal wikis
 • Suggesting process/system improvements

?

???? Required Skills:
 • Fluent English (spoken and written)
 • Proven Notion experience (must be able to show past work)
 • Highly organised and detail-oriented
 • Able to work independently and follow instructions
 • Comfortable joining occasional UK-time Zoom calls

?

???? Bonus If You Have Experience With:
 • Zapier, Slack, Loom, Airtable, Google Workspace
 • SOP writing, process documentation, or internal ops
 • Startup, agency, or async remote environments

?

???? How to Apply:

Please follow these instructions carefully:
 1. Start your message with NOTIONFLOW
 2. Include a link to a Notion page or workspace you’ve built
 3. Share your hourly rate and UK-time availability
 4. List 3 tools you’ve used and what for
 5. (Optional) Send a 1-minute Loom or voice note introducing yourself

?

???? Work Hours & Timezone:
 • Part-time: 5–10 hours/week
 • Some UK business hour availability required
 • Fully remote, async-friendly with occasional live calls
